Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield Libraries, Archives and Information. Stock and facilities include: A3 and A4 photocopier, children's play equipment, talking books, large print books, newspapers, DVDs, language cassettes, notice board and Job Shop. Activities include Baby Time, adult reading group (see separate entry), computer classes, Friday club for children aged 6-12 years and Councillors' surgeries. Provides 3 People's Network computers with Microsoft Office and Internet access available for public use.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon 10am-12.30pm, 1.30-5.30pm, Tues & Wed closed, Thurs 9.30am-12.30pm, 1.30-5.30pm, Fri 9.30am-12.30pm, 1.30-7pm, Sat 9.30am-12.30pm (opening times); last Mon in the month 10.30-11.30am (Baby Time, 0-2 years), Tues 10am-12noon & Wed 1.30-3pm (computer class, please contact for more information), Fri 5-6pm (Friday Club, 6-11 years, waiting list, please contact for more information), last Fri in the month at 10.30am (reading group), 3rd Sat in the month 11am-12.30pm (Councillor's Surgery)
